name: Crash Bandicoot Psyched Out
summary: Crash Bandicoot is back in another fan-game adventure! This time the evil N.Trance has brainwashed the entire planet and brought his army of interdimensional aliens to wreak havoc across the globe. Only Crash and his nemesis Dr. Neo Cortex are spared from being N.Trance's slaves, and must once again team up to put an end to his twisted reign! Play as both characters as you travel the planet and quite literally pick the brains of your favorite characters from the crash-verse! Are you ready to get psyched?
